modName: NMM Compatibility How To Guide 4 Modders n Players
summary: NMM Compatibility How To Guide 4 Modders n Players. TXT file for notepad.
descriptionHtml:
This is to help modders or even just texture replacer modders make their files compatible with the Nexus Mod Manager.  ANYONE who checks mods before installing them will find this helpful also so this actually isn\'t JUST a guide for modders...more of a help guide for installing and making mods compatible with NMM.

All of my guides are written in notepad and are text documents. Virus proof unless you already have one running around your system.

TESV HiRes Texture Packs List
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33284

NMM Compatibility How to
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33616

Uninstaller Creator Updated 2013
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33619

TESV Main BSA Files List
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33649

Safe Basic NMM Installation Guide
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33657

Chain ENB and SKSE Autoloader
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33613

DDS File Viewer
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33703
author: Thorne67
